CustomField.formula:
IF(( Approved_Estimate__c <= 0),0,( Internal_Estiimate__c - ( Approved_Estimate__c + X1st_Supplement__c + X2nd_Supplement__c + X3rd_Supplement__c )))
/*IF(( Approved_Estimate__c <= 0),0,( Internal_Estiimate__c - Total_Amount_Receivable__c))*/
CustomField.label: Approved Estimate Difference
